abstract: Editorial asserts that wireless companies should provide customers with transparent pricing and more choices, and the Federal Communications Commission must establish regulations with bite.
snippet: Wireless companies should provide customers with transparent pricing and more choices. And the F.C.C. must establish regulations with bite.
lead_paragraph: Wireless companies should provide customers with transparent pricing and more choices. And the F.C.C. must establish regulations with bite.

headline.main: How to Fix the Wireless Market
headline.print_headline: How to Fix the Wireless Market
